title: update later broken
content: When FF asks to update, I pick "later" to have the update happen after I close it. But the next time I start up FF it asks again. I've done this a few times now, seems stuck. How do I unstick it?
creator: bleeper

title: Unable to complete order on Amazon
content:
Starting 3/4/2022, I am not able to checkout an order placed in the Amazon cart. I never had this issue before 3/5/22. Firefox is my default browser. I am able to browse, access my orders, etc. However, when I proceed to Checkout a blank page displays with two statements:

You cannot buy this item because it's out of stock Another seller might have a comparable offer for the same item. If available, see all buying options and try adding to cart.

I removed all items from the cart and tried purchasing individually and got the same message. I closed Firefox and tried again with no change. I also cleared cached Web content, but did not clear cookie data. I tried to purchase a different product on 3/6/22, which would be the forth different item and all from different providers. I had the same issue. All products stated they were in stock before and after putting them in the cart. I did open a ticket with Amazon. On 3/6/22, I logged into our Amazon account with MS Edge and I was able to order all products that failed with Firefox. I looked at recent Firefox update history and there was a security update on 3/5/22 and I am on version 97.0.2.

Don
creator: friedadog

title: How do I change the Bookmark File Folder Favicon(File Folder Icon)
content: Is there a way to change the File Folder Favicon. I use my bookmark toolbar extensively. It is very handy. Because I have so many bookmarks in the toolbar I delete the labels whenever possible. But this is not possible for bookmark files since only the File icon is available. I have searched extensively and cannot find anything even close to helpful.
creator: chiefwaller

title: Bookmark Padding in New Firefox Versions 2
content:
It is sad, I think, that Mozilla/Firefox is willing to close/archive a thread that is not really solved or has reared its ugly head again in versions since the release of 93 (we are now at 97.0.2). I came to this site and registered because I am still having this issue as of 3/6/2022...arg!

I have tried the 3 recommended solutions, with no affect:

  • Compact mode workaround in Firefox
  • Customize Firefox controls, buttons and toolbars
  • Create the userChrome.css style sheet - no go.

I have, as one article suggested, cleared my cache and cookies, started and restarted Firefox; the only thing I have not tried is removing it from my computer and using Chrome (I'm told it is a better browser anyway) as some responders have eluded to.

I hope that responders like "jscher2000, Kymber" will continue the champion this issue until Mozilla gets it "Really" fixed.

Thanks for listening, Wayne

BTW, heres what my dropdowns look like today 3/6/2022 6:17 PM Arizona time.
creator: waynelfuller49
